attributes.action: Increase the UK Tax-Free Personal Allowance to £20,000
attributes.additional_details:
Allowance Too Low
Rising costs mean people pay tax without real income gains. £20,000 is more realistic.

Helping Workers
A higher allowance boosts take-home pay and eases household pressure.

Economic Boost
More retained earnings encourage work and support businesses.

Stopping Stealth Taxes
Fiscal drag pushes people into higher bands unfairly; raising the allowance fixes this.

Supporting Recovery
More disposable income fuels spending and economic recovery.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, respectfully call upon the UK Gov. to increase the personal tax-free allowance from the current £12,570 to £20,000. This change is urgently needed to reflect the real cost of living in the United Kingdom, support working households, and stimulate economic stability and growth.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737513
